name: tokenization
description: The process of converting rights to an asset into a digital token on a blockchain.

name: mining
description: The process of validating and recording transactions on the blockchain by solving complex mathematical problems

name: wallet
description: A digital tool (software or hardware) that allows users to store and manage their cryptocurrencies.

name: blockchain
description: A decentralized digital ledger that records transactions across many computers.

name: nft
description: a unique digital asset verified using blockchain technology.

name: fork
description: Updates or changes to the blockchain protocol that create a divergence in the blockchain network.

name: dapp
description: A decentralized application that runs on a blockchain network.

name: smartcontract
description: A self-executing contract with the terms of the agreement directly written into code.

name: token
description: A digital asset that represents ownership or a stake in a project, often used in blockchain networks.

name: node
description: A computer connected to a blockchain network, participating in the network's consensus process

name: validator
description: A participant in a blockchain network responsible for verifying transactions

name: validator
description: A participant in a blockchain network responsible for verifying transactions
